item.title: Runescape Classic Replica - Try It Out Today!
item.dc:creator: @The_Boss2 The_Boss
item.description:
@The_Boss2 wrote:

Ch ivava:

Stop your useless spamming, its pointless and surely not going to help anyone. Just because he is joining another project, and you guys are all just jelly, because you havent been able to stick around with a server for longer than 1 month.

  1. I’ve never had my own server, therefore how is it possible that I didn’t stick with it for a month?
  2. I play NO server right now because their is none that are worth playing. Shitty, under developed PK servers, or RSCE… or I could join your fantastic server with Printz as an admin.
  3. Noone is “Jelly” Lol’d.
  4. Who the fuck wants Printz as the admin of their server? The kid is a retard. LOL

Printz is a KNOWN bug abuser, and when he got mod on RSCF he ABUSED THE FUCK OUT OF IT. And you say that he won’t have the ability to do so here, if he as an Admin, surely he has some type of powers which I’m also SURE he will abuse.

Also… What an advertisement, a whole 6 people… and that’s the whole server pop… LOL

Read full topic
